mapper.select: select m.member_name, m.designer_enter from member_tbl m left join designer_tbl d on m.member_id = d.member_id where d.designer_career is not null and m.member_type = 3 and rownum < 7 and m.designer_enter = 0 order by 1 desc

with select_month as( select to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1*(level-1)),'yyyy-mm') mon from dual connect by level <= 6 ) select mon, sum(nvl(interior_price,0)) as total_price,interior_designer, m.member_name, m.MEMBER_PHONE from select_month left join (select * from interior_tbl) on (mon = substr(interior_payment_date,1,7)) left join member_tbl m on interior_designer = member_id where mon = #{toMonth} and rownum < 6 group by (mon,interior_designer,m.member_name,m.member_phone) order by 2 desc

select nvl(sum(total_price),0) as total_of_month, nvl(sum(designer_charge),0) as designer_month, nvl(sum(company_charge),0) as site_revenue from ( select sum(nvl(interior_price,0)) as total_price ,interior_designer as id, m.member_name as name, sum(nvl(interior_price,0) * (1 - interior_payment_charge/100)) as designer_charge , sum(nvl(interior_price,0) * interior_payment_charge/100) as company_charge, i.INTERIOR_PAYMENT_DATE from interior_tbl i left join member_tbl m on interior_designer = member_id where substr(i.INTERIOR_PAYMENT_DATE,1,7) = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm') group by (interior_designer,m.member_name, i.INTERIOR_PAYMENT_DATE) order by 2 desc)

select d.space_name, nvl(sum((space_count)* d.SPACE_PRICE), 0) as total_of_space from INTERIOR_DETAIL_TBL d left join INTERIOR_TBL i on d.interior_no=i.interior_no where substr(i.INTERIOR_PAYMENT_DATE,1,7) = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm') GROUP by (d.space_name, d.SPACE_PRICE, d.space_name)

with select_month as( select to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1*(level-1)),'yyyy-mm') mon
from dual connect by level <= 3
from dual connect by level <= 6
from dual connect by level <= 12
) select mon, sum(nvl(interior_price,0)) as price_of_month from select_month left join (select * from interior_tbl) on (mon = substr(interior_payment_date,1,7)) group by (mon) order by 1
